Temperature-controlled transport for biologics and research samples.

Why Biotech Logistics Matters

  • Biologic materials are highly temperature-sensitive.
  • Research timelines depend on reliable delivery.
  • Strict regulatory and chain-of-custody standards apply.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do you prevent temperature excursions?

Our validated packaging systems and continuous monitoring ensure temperature stability throughout transit.

Do you support ‚Äì80¬∞C and LN2 shipments?

Yes, we provide specialized deep-frozen and liquid nitrogen vapor transport solutions.

What documentation is provided for research compliance?

We provide complete chain-of-custody documentation and temperature logs for regulatory compliance.
